subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Television
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: NBC’s sports cable network is covering every figure skater, every pair and every dance team. And the commentators Tara Lipinski and Johnny Weir are making the comprehensive programming a success.
snippet: NBC’s sports cable network is covering every figure skater, every pair and every dance team. And the commentators Tara Lipinski and Johnny Weir are making the comprehensive programming a success.
